trans-unit.source: Supports a trigger action that resumes a paused <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지 다시 시작 하는 트리거 동작을 지원 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this class with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to resume a paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스를 사용 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>일시 중지 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> 다시 시작 하려면</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: A ResumeStoryboard object can only resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that is paused and has no effect on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> in any other state.
trans-unit.target: ResumeStoryboard 개체 에서만 다시 시작할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>일시 중지 하 고 영향을 주지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>다른 상태에서.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, ResumeStoryboard, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 일시 중지할 수를 다시 시작 하거나 다른 방식으로 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>대화형으로 설정는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>속성의 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>개체 (같은 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, ResumeStoryboard, 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> 참조 하 여 제어할 수</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively controlled after it starts.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>의 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>지정 되어 있지는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>으로 시작 된 후에 대화형으로 제어할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: 한 스토리 보드 후 시작을 제어 하려면 이벤트 트리거를 사용 하 여](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard"></xref> class.
